name: My way of protesting
description:
My life has taught me very early what is betrayal and abuse. I felt fast that inside of me always was my best answer.

I could have been very angry and fuck off myself. 

Instead, I chose to climb mountains as a form of protest against everything that wants me locked up.

I don't want anybody to feel encaged, I desire that everybody can feel that they are where they want.

So, this is my way of protesting. 
Drink some mate at the top of a mountain.
Not burning anything, just dreaming and reaching it.

Juan.

3500 x 2500 px
Picture from Monte Serva, Belluno, Italy.
